channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
so ok so i did everything to run my server so then i try to log in and i couldn't so then i thought it ain't work but then i try logging in using moparisthebest.com client then i log in and out on my other computer, then it got me thinking my server works! but not sure what wrong with my client either it my client or server because i tried running the server in other computer with the client then it works i switch host computer client not logging me in? so.. help? any idea why, if this helps i changed the client ip not sure how so i asked and they said type in server =, But there was 2 server = these are it i changed the second one to my server ip
server = "127.0.0.1";
second
public static String server = "xdeception.no-ip.biz";

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Liljrbaby Liljrbaby
item.description:
@Liljrbaby wrote:

i said i used moparscape client and it log in me and out but i used the custom client it work log in me at all i think something wrong with client?

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

When it logs in for a moment then logs out, that usually means that you are not using the right client for your server source. Are you getting any T1 errors or anything similar in the command prompt?

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Liljrbaby Liljrbaby
item.description:
@Liljrbaby wrote:

no response from server trying using a diff world…? u got skype aim or msn? because i need help bro =\ need another way to communicate.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

Liljrbaby:

ok so i changed the numbers to my server ip and still can’t log…?

Well… What’s the client saying?..

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

server = "127.0.0.1";

Only need to change that one.

server = "xdeception.no-ip.biz";

Read full topic
